name: AVSampleCursorSyncInfo
desc: A structure that describes the attributes of media samples to consider when resynchronizing a decoder.

items.name: var sampleIsFullSync: ObjCBool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether a sample is a full sync sample.

items.name: var sampleIsPartialSync: ObjCBool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether a sample is a partial sync sample.

items.name: var sampleIsDroppable: ObjCBool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether a sample is droppable.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a sample cursor sync information structure.

items.name: init(sampleIsFullSync: ObjCBool, sampleIsPartialSync: ObjCBool, sampleIsDroppable: ObjCBool)
items.desc: Creates a sample cursor sync information structure with media sample information.
